name: Angularjs-script-runner
tagline: A simple directive that helps running scripts from within angular template pages.
body:
AngularJS-Script-Runner
=======================

A simple directive that helps running scripts from within angular template pages.


Usage Example
-------------------------
```
<script script-runner>
    // Your code here
</script>
```


ToDO:
-------------------------
* Add support to external scripts.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
